property.value: Header iView

property.name: plainDescription
property.value: Show Personalize context menu in Masthead

property.name: longDescription
property.value: Show or hide the 'Personalize' context menu in the masthead iView at runtime.

property.name: plainDescription
property.value: Show Link in Masthead: Personalize

property.name: longDescription
property.value: Show or hide the 'Personalize' link displayed in the masthead iView at runtime.

property.value: URL of Help Link

property.name: plainDescription
property.value: Show Link in Masthead: Help

property.name: longDescription
property.value: Show or hide the 'Help' link displayed in the masthead iView at runtime.

property.name: plainDescription
property.value: Show Help context menu in Masthead

property.name: longDescription
property.value: Show or hide the 'Help' context menu in the masthead iView at runtime.

property.value: Show Menu Entry in Masthead: Open Help Center

property.name: longDescription
property.value: Show or hide the 'Open Help Center' menu option displayed in the masthead iView at runtime.

property.value: Show Menu Entry in Masthead: Open ByDesign Help Center

property.name: longDescription
property.value: Show or hide the 'Open ByDesign Help Center' menu option displayed in the masthead iView at runtime.

property.name: plainDescription
property.value: Show Menu Entry in Masthead: Open Learning Center

property.name: longDescription
property.value: Show or hide the 'Open Learning Center' menu option displayed in the masthead iView at runtime.

property.name: plainDescription
property.value: Navigation Target of Business Objects

property.name: longDescription
property.value: Specify the location of the Business Objects that is accessed from the Help menu in the masthead. An empty value navigates to an empty window.

property.name: plainDescription
property.value: Navigation Target of Learning Center

property.name: longDescription
property.value: Specify the location of the Learning Center that is accessed from the Help menu in the masthead. An empty value navigates to an empty window.

property.name: plainDescription
property.value: Show Link in Masthead: New Session

property.name: longDescription
property.value: Show or hide the 'New Session' link displayed in the masthead iView at runtime.

property.name: plainDescription
property.value: Show Link in Masthead: Log In / Log Off

property.name: longDescription
property.value: Show or hide the 'Log In' / Log Off' link displayed in the masthead iView at runtime.

property.name: longDescription
